dct_alternative_sm: Terrae Sanctae quae Promissionis Terra, est Syriae pars ea, quae Palaestina vocatur, descriptio
dct_description_sm: per Tylemannum Stellam ; Gerardus de Jode excudebat ; Joannes à Deutecùm, Lucas à Deutecùm Fecerunt.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, places of historical interest.
Features a pictorial vignette of Jerusalem and illustrations of ships and a sea monster.
